response.answer_text: Can you rap? Are you in the NBA, NFL etc. Are you a poet? A teacher? All of these professions use talent and some form of artistry. Their is an Art to Love Making. Their is an Art of War. Whatever you do exceptionally well and better than the next person is your ART. Rap is an Art because not everyone can do it.

By definition, art is the expression or application of human creative skill and imagination. This can mean that ANYTHING can be art as you see fit! Personally, I believe rap is art because it expresses emotional concepts (and not just your typical angry rara stuff). The instrumental gives you a setting and the artist performing is the tour guide. I also view it as an audible painting too.
